DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study, is to assess the prevalence of Metabolic Syndrome in Italy on a regional basis, defined according to NCEP/ATPIII Guidelines criteria.
DOC.brief_title: Regional Observatory on Metabolic Syndrome- LAZIO
DOC.criteria: lipid profile in the last year Signed informed consent Subjects with serious or unstable medical or psychological conditions that, in the opinion of the investigator, would compromise the subject's successful participation in the study Pregnancy or breast feeding Subject who are unwilling or unable to provide the informed consent
